message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I'm extending this opportunity for you to purchase it at an exclusive price of $120. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know if you're interested.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking for a lower price. Would you consider selling it to me for $105?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and I'm willing to negotiate further. Considering the value you place on the product, I propose to offer it to you for $110. This is my best offer for now.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $107 for your product. I hope this meets within your acceptable range.
I appreciate your interest, Bob. After considering your proposal, I would like to offer the product to you for $108. This is my final offer in this negotiation.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts in negotiating. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $106 for your product. I hope this aligns with your considerations.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. Considering the value of the product and our previous discussions, I am willing to accept $107 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise.
